artist: Engraver: Bernard Picart; Painter: After Velut
description: portrait of the artist Stephen Picart, called The Roman, bust length facing right and looking over left shoulder; long curly hair; white lace collar and white full sleeves, tight at wrist; right hand at chest pointiing left; in an oval frame
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on sheet in black: Velu pinx Rome   B.P. sculp 1690 / Stephanus Picart Romanus /  Elatus sue 25 ani  | on sheet in pencil: 2-192  |  on verso in pencil: not in Catec / Vol 2 1902
title: Portrait of Stephen Picart, the Roman
